speed.title: Speed Guarantee
speed.desc: We review all new claims within <bold>24 business hours</bold>. You won't be left wondering.

safety.title: No Win, No Fee
safety.desc: You pay nothing upfront. Our service fee is deducted only from the final compensation.

speed.title: Fast Intake
speed.description: Takes less than 5 minutes to submit.

response.title: 24h Response
response.description: We review every new claim within 24 hours.

secure.title: Secure Data
secure.description: Your documents are encrypted and protected.

meta.title: Prime Services | Interdomestik
meta.description: Fast, safe, and professional claim handling for vehicle damage, property issues, and personal injury.

hero.title: Professional Claim Resolution Service
hero.subtitle: We handle the complexity of claims so you can get the compensation you deserve. Fast, safe, and transparent.

vehicle.title: Vehicle & Traffic
vehicle.description: Collision damage, third-party liability claims, and hit-and-run incidents.

property.title: Property Damage
property.description: Fire, flood, theft, or damage to your home or business premises.

injury.title: Personal Injury
injury.description: Compensation for injuries sustained due to accidents or negligence.

step1.title: 1. Start Claim
step1.description: Complete our simple guided wizard in under 5 minutes.

step2.title: 2. We Review
step2.description: Our experts analyze your case and evidence within 24 hours.

step3.title: 3. Resolution
step3.description: We negotiate with the opposing party to secure your compensation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We operate on a 'No Win, No Fee' basis for most claims. You only pay a small percentage if we succeed.
faq.a2: Simple claims are resolved in weeks. Complex cases may take longer, but we keep you updated.
